mdRecord.dcterms:title: Thomas Jefferson Project
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Thomas Jefferson Project consists of over 700 manuscript documents, chiefly correspondence, written and received by Thomas Jefferson. It brings together materials from nine collections held by the Special Collections Research Center, and the digital content is contributed to the Founders Online of the National Archives, https://founders.archives.gov. The Founders Online website provides full transcriptions of these documents. Scanning of the materials was funded by the Papers of Thomas Jefferson (2003) and the Delmas Foundation (2005).
